name: Borne Digital
description:
Borne is a different kind of digital agency. 

We are a mobile first digital agency. A creative and strategic company developing mobile apps, websites and digital products in London.

We work with early stage start ups to help them with their branding, strategy and designs right through to the finished product. We also work with a select few corporate clients to assist them with their digital roadmap. 

We aim to over deliver, be a boutique agency and take pride in our work.

team.title: CEO and Head Of Sales
team.name: John Radford
team.bioHtml: Founder and Head of Sales @Borne Digital • Passionate digital leader and revenue generator. Proven ability to build and lead teams

team.name: Elliott Gibb
team.bioHtml: I really enjoy making things. Co-Founder & CEO at @SocialiveUK

jobs.title: Project Manager - Digital Product Studio
jobs.description:
An excellent opportunity to join one of London's best Digital Product Studios and work on some fantastic projects. We’re looking for passionate, inquisitive and dedicated individuals who will become integral members of a talented and ambitious team.

There is genuine potential for development, a collaborative culture and great projects to work on. The agency is very much focussed on the start up space and helping young entrepreneurs get to market quickly. We design and develop apps and websites from a mobile first perspective.

The role will involve leading the project and development teams in the delivery of a range of projects, most of which will be mobile with some web elements and using agile methods. This could include large complex web builds, mobile and tablet apps, online games as well as smaller quicker turnaround projects.

You will get the chance to work on complex, large digital builds and as such experience of digital design and build projects will be necessary. We work with internal and external teams, so you will be working with Designers, Developers and Producers from external sources as well as in house teams.

This role would suit an ambitious project manager with 2-3 years of experience in mobile looking to make their next move.

REQUIREMENTS

Experience running and delivering multiple mobile app based projects is essential. Agile experience is also essential to the role. 
Assume ownership stake in all key processes including work in-take, sprint planning, timelines, execution, launch and retrospectives. Drive continuous review and optimization of these processes to ensure alignment with the business and operational goals.
A love of the start up scene 
An analytical mindset and an ability to organise yourself effectively 
Knowledge of online tools such as JIRA, Slack, Harvest and TeamWeek 
Knowledge and experience of both Scrum and Waterfall methodologies 
Understand and be able talk about digital UX, Design and Development 
You will have a reasonable understanding of development methods and be able to 'talk tech' where necessary. 
An ability to translate a clients vision into real world solutions. 
Managing creative / technical teams 
Managing 3rd Parties

BENEFITS
A unique chance to get your hands on the some great projects and shape the agency 
You will be working out of our office in London. 
A salary that compliments your talent and experience. 
An exciting work environment with the opportunity to grow and improve your skills into new areas. 
An excellent bonus structure for projects delivered on time 
All the usual, such as beers on Friday, 22 Days holiday rising to 25 after 1 year, Company lunches and a fun a relaxed environment.
